segments.text: Calvin , how much money did you spend last weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Lily , I ’ m not sure . Let me check , I think I spent $ 50 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don ’ t you help me save money ? You are always spending money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know that I should learn how to save more , but I hope that we can spend a little on ourselves sometimes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . I guess I ’ m too extreme when it comes putting money in the bank .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s okay . I ’ m sorry , too . It ’ s a good idea to prepare for the future possibilities .
segments.speaker: S2
